cmput301w15t07.TravelTracker.serverinterface

Class FileSystemHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w15t07.TravelTracker.serverinterface.FileSystemHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerHelper

    public class FileSystemHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerHelper
    An interface to the local file system to cache data when server connection is lost.
    Author:
    kdbanman
